external_games.name: Train Simulator: Los Angeles Commuter Rail F59PH Loco Add-On

name: Train Simulator: Los Angeles Commuter Rail F59PH Loco Add-On
summary: Based on the GP59, the first in the F59 Series - the F59PH - is a common diesel electric locomotive used by a number of North American railroads. The F59PH, built by General Motors Electro-Motive Division, offered a more fuel efficiency and more efficient driving conditions than its predecessors.
